transcript_chunks.text: and I can confidently say that this is a 10 out of 10 Masterpiece on the kind of funny review scale and it is easily my game of the year I think if you're not just a Persona fan but an atlas fan I think this is a must play I think if you're a fan of the genre I think this is a must try so going into this game I was kind of both excited and apprehensive I'm very excited to see what the OG kind of persona team has to follow up Persona 5 with even if this game was great I just was a little bit nervous that like it still wasn't going to hit for me now being on the other side of this 87h hour Journey for myself I can say that I had nothing to worry about
